Author: thr0wawaynametaken
Text: get support! if possible, a dietician would be able to help you ease into IE healthily and you can talk about (potential) binges with them - sometimes what you perceive as a binge in recovery isn't, but if it is, they can offer tips to stay balanced.  the therapeutic side is also helpful for staying on track with recovery for a variety of reasons, combating thoughts, discussing any slips you have, working on coping skills, etc.  best of luck with this, there is a way through!!

Author: coconutfi

You have to accept you will binge, but it should calm down after a week or two.  Donâ€™t get down on yourself about it. Good luckðŸ’•
